src:
Kartik Aaryan's 'Pati Patni Aur Woh' has a reprised version of 'Akhiyon Se Goli Maare'; here's what Raveena Tandon has to say about it
06 Nov 2019, 09:36 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
The trailer of Kartik Aaryan, Bhumi Pednekar and Ananya Panday's upcoming film 'Pati Patni Aur Woh' which was released by the makers of the film on Monday this week saw a great response from the audience as well as other B-town celebs.
The trio has managed to weave their magic in the trailer and the film which is a remake of 1978 Hindi film with the same title which featured Sanjeev Kumar, Vidya Sinha and Ranjeeta Kaur looks to be quite promising.
Helmed by Mudassar Aziz, the trailer also had a reprised version of Govinda and Raveena Tandon popular song 'Akhiyon Se Goli Maare' playing in the background. Responding to it, Raveena took to social and hailed the trailer of the film by writing "Hahaha ya it’s faaaab!! Looks great @mudassar_as_is @bhumipednekar @TheAaryanKartik @ananyapandayy @AAFilmsIndia @junochopra congratulations! Ps love the remix"



While Raveena loved the new version of her famous song, Kartik was quick enough to notice her tweet and responded to her immediately. He wrote, "Thank you so much Mam ❤️ Cant wait for you to see it !! #PatiPatniAurWoh"



Well, the film which is slated to release on 6th December this year is all set clash with Arjun Kapoor's periodic drama 'Panipat'. Meanwhile, the film's trailer has been trending on social media with several Bollywood celebrities also praising the young actors.
